views.markdown:
Compatible with all iOS 11, iPhone X and older devices using HomeGesture.

Tiny tweak. Brings sounds to the Flashlight/Camera 3D Touch toggles on iOS 11's lock screen. This is supposed to mimic iOS 12.1, however I couldn't find the exact sound from 12.1, so it uses the sound that's given when scrolling through date/time pickers on stock iOS.

Compatible with all iOS 11, iPhone X and older devices using HomeGesture.

No options to configure.

No Screenshots for this item.
